articles.title: Talks between Foreign Ministers of DPRK and Russia Held
articles.content:
Talks between Foreign Ministers of DPRK and Russia Held
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho and his Russian counterpart Sergei Lavrov on Tuesday.
					 Ri is heading the DPRK government delegation on an official visit to the Russian Federation.
					
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were members of the delegation and the DPRK ambassador to Russia and his embassy officials, and from the Russian side were officials concerned of the Foreign Ministry.
					
					 At the talks the two sides reached a consensus of their views that it conforms to the aspiration and desire of the peoples of the two countries to further develop the DPRK-Russia friendly and cooperative relations with a long history and tradition.
					
					 They agreed to boost the reciprocal good-neighborly cooperative relations in various fields including politics and economy this significant year marking the 70th anniversary of the establishment of DPRK-Russia diplomatic relations and exchanged their views on the regional and international matters of mutual concern.
					
					 The Russian side expressed the stand fully supporting the detente and peaceful atmosphere created recently on the Korean peninsula thanks to the peace-loving stand and bold decision by the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Ri Yong Ho met Nikolai Patrushev, secretary general of the Security Council of the Russian Federation on Monday.

articles.title: Chinese Art Troupe to Take Part in April Spring Friendship Art Festival
articles.content:
Chinese Art Troupe to Take Part in April Spring Friendship Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A Chinese art troupe led by Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, will visit the DPRK to take part in the 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					 The prestigious large-scale art troupe of China will contribute to consolidating the cornerstone of the DPRK-China cultural exchange and strengthening the traditional DPRK-China friendly relations onto a new high stage as it is to visit the DPRK for the first time after the supreme leaders of the two countries agreed on strengthening the cultural exchange during the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's first historic visit to China.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea will warmly welcome the artists of the friendly neighboring country and specially greet them with the greatest sincerity.

articles.title: Chinese Guests, Koreans in China Arrive
articles.content:
Chinese Guests, Koreans in China Arrive
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Wang Haifu, general manager of the China's Yanbian Yiqiao Commercial Co. Ltd., and his party, Wang Wenri, CEO of the Dandong Shenpu Technology Co. Ltd., and his party, Choe Ryong Ho, vice-president for joint operation of Pyongyang University of Science and Technology, and his party arrived here on Wednesday to take part in the 20th Kimilsungia Festival.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Political Party of Spain
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Political Party of Spain
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the People of Spain.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on Wednesday by Maria Teresa Pantoja Bargueno, member of the Political Bureau of the party and secretary of the Anti-imperialist Solidarity, on a visit to the DPRK as the head of the delegation of the party on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Russian Guests Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Russian Guests Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Aleksei Kozitski, chairman of the Maritime Territorial Branch Committee of "A Just Russia", and his party visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home of the President, the visitors looked round the historical mementoes, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and on his revolutionary family members.
					
					 The Russian guests also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Korean Revolution Museum, the Ryuwon Footwear Factory and other places and laid a bouquet at the Liberation Tower.

articles.title: 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival Opens
articles.content:
31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival opened here on Wednesday, with due ceremony at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					 Taking part in the festival are prestigious and talented artistes of different countries and vocalists who proved successful in the First Pyongyang International Vocal Competition.
					
					 When foreign artistes and overseas Korean artistes arrived at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre, working people in the city warmly welcomed them, waving bouquets.
					
					 The atmosphere of the festival opening ceremony revved up when a female brass band played cheerful music and artistes presented graceful dances and acrobatic pieces and children displayed skills.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Pak Kwang Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Jon Kwang Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials concerned, working people in the city, foreign artistes, overseas Korean artistes, delegations of different countries, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here, military attaches and officials of foreign embassies here and overseas Koreans staying in the socialist homeland.
					
					 Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture who is chairman of the festival organizing committee, made an opening address.
					
					 He warmly welcomed the participants in the 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival marking the 106th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He thanked governments and culture and art circles of different countries for their positive cooperation for a successful festival, true to the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 He expressed the expectation that the excellent cultures and traditions of relevant countries and nations would be fully shown on the stages of the festival.
					
					 The head of the Russian State Academic People's Chorus Named after M. E. Pyatnichki and the head of the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Mongolian Army made congratulatory speeches.
					
					 A performance of Korean artistes was given at the ceremony.

articles.title: Dancing Party of Women's Union Officials and Members Held
articles.content:
Dancing Party of Women's Union Officials and Members Held
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of officials and members of the women's union was held at the plaza of the Monument to Party Founding Wednesday on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the party and the state.
					 With song "Cheers of the People" reverberating, the participants began to dance, extending the glory and congratulations to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 As they danced to the tune of "His Embrace Is the Best", they were proud of being Korean women pushing one of the two wheels of revolutionary chariot under the leadership of the Party.
					
					 The enthusiasm of patriotic Korean women pervaded the dancing venue along with songs "I Will Live like a Star Following Party" and "My Prospering Country".
					
					 The participants sang songs like "We Will Go to Mt Paektu" with firm pledge to demonstrate the revolutionary stamina of Korean women in the great Mallima advance today, revving up the atmosphere of the dancing party.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in different parts of the country Wednesday in celebration of the 6th anniversary of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the party and the state.
					The dancing parties started to the tune of the song "Cheers of the People" at the dancing party venues in the capital city including the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Arch of Triumph and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.
					
					The participants presented a sea of dances with the greatest glory to Kim Jong Un in reflection of the unanimous wishes of the young vanguard all over the country.
					
					Songs like "Country of People", "Song of Big Fish Haul" and "Song of Socialist Advance" added to the festive mood.
					
					Similar dancing parties took place in provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Posters for 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival Produced
articles.content:
Posters for 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival Produced
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Posters were produced for the 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival to be held on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The posters reflect the desire of the participants in the festival to hold the President who made immortal contribution to the development of friendly relations among countries and the cause of global independence, in high esteem as the eternal sun of mankind and sing songs in praise of the great man generation after generation.
					
					 The posters show performing scenes of experienced art troupe, acrobatic troupe and dancing troupe, international concours winners and other famous artistes of different countries.
					
					 Depicted on them are Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia, famous flowers praising the great men, and the festival logo and the names of the participating organizations and period of the festival.

articles.title: April 25 Team Beats Benfica Macao Team
articles.content:
April 25 Team Beats Benfica Macao Team
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Matches between teams belonging to Group I (East Asia) of the 2018 AFC Cup continue.
					 The first match between the April 25 team of the DPRK and the Benfica Macao team of Macao of China was held at the May Day Stadium here on Wednesday.
					
					 The April 25 team beat its rival 8:0.

articles.title: Papers Call for Dynamic Advance under Guidance of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Papers Call for Dynamic Advance under Guidance of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK Wednesday dedicated editorials to the 6th anniversary of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the State.
					 Rodong Sinmun stresses that his assumption of the top posts of the WPK and the State at the Fourth Conference of the WPK and the Fifth Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK in April Juche 101 (2012) was a historic event in which a fresh milestone was set up for accomplishing the cause of building a powerful socialist country, the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 This made it possible to glorify the noble revolutionary careers and undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il forever and invariably inherit the bloodline of Paektu, the tradition of single-hearted unity, it says.
					
					 An ever-victorious great guiding force and a powerful and promising socialist state--these are the prestige of our Party and country led by Kim Jong Un, the paper says, adding:
					
					 His guidance ensures the authority of the WPK, the independent dignity of Juche Korea and the worthwhile life and rosy future of our people.
					
					 His august name and image as the heaven-sent great man have been kept deeper in the minds of the Korean army and people through the violent storm of history decisive of the destiny of the country, the nation and socialism. Our army and people have grown into those strong in idea and faith, absolutely trusting and following the Supreme Leader, and built a manifold fortress to protect the Party.
					
					 It is thanks to him that our Party and State have displayed their dignity as the glorious party and state of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Korean-style socialism could advance full of vigor and dynamism, opening a great heyday of national prosperity.
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that no force on the earth can block the dynamic advance of the DPRK dashing ahead like the wind towards the high eminence of a powerful socialist country under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Refrain from Hurting Their Dialogue Partner
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Refrain from Hurting Their Dialogue Partner
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities recently supported the UN Security Council's addition to the "list of sanctions on the DPRK" as an expression of the "will to fulfill the resolution on sanctions on the DPRK".
					 Minju Joson in a commentary Wednesday brands this as a confrontational racket aimed at chilling the present situation that has been created with much effort.
					
					 Any Korean who truly wishes for peace on the Korean peninsula and reunification of the country is obliged to put the interests of the nation above all and subordinate everything to them, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 But the south Korean authorities continue to slander the DPRK behind the scene despite their call for "dialogue" and "improvement of the relations" in front.
					
					 We would like to make it clear to the south Korean authorities. Their act of getting keen on the sanctions and pressure on the DPRK by currying favor with outsiders will bring them isolation and destruction. This is the lesson left by the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye regimes which were forsaken by the nation and sternly punished by history.
					
					 The idea of prioritizing the nation and national cooperation can never go together with dependence on outsiders and cooperation with outsiders.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly hope for peace and reunification, they should prioritize the interests of the nation and refrain from slandering and hurting the fellow countrymen, their dialogue partner. If they adopt double-dealing attitudes as now, it will bring them irrevocable serious consequences. They should clearly remember this, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Control Its Tongue
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Control Its Tongue
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Japan's Foreign Minister Kono at a recent lecture talked rubbish that "one should not respond in haste to the DPRK's charm offensive", "there is no need to hurry" and "the DPRK may take advantage of it".
					 Commenting on his remarks, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says:
					
					 The Japanese newspaper Asahi Shimbun reported that "Japan fears it might be isolated in the hot wind of diplomacy in Northeast Asia". Meanwhile, a member of the House of Representatives of Japan expressed displeasure over the incompetence of the government, saying Japanese people are concerned that Japan is left alone in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Kono's remarks are no more than grumbling by the lonely island nation which was sidelined under the developing regional situation.
					
					 Japan is worrying about the fact that it is being isolated in Northeast Asia by the rapidly changing situation focusing on the DPRK.
					
					 Now those countries related to the issue of the Korean Peninsula make diplomatic efforts to join in the good development of the situation in the region.
					
					 However, only Japan is reeling off the reckless confrontation remarks which will get nowhere, going against the trend of the times. That's why Japan is to be censured by the public at home and abroad as a senseless one with poor thinking ability.
					
					 Japan is being more ignored like foam in the kaleidoscopic regional situation.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to control its tongue.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Distort History
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Distort History
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Recently the Japanese government disclosed the guidelines on teaching for senior middle schools in which Tok Islets are designated as "territory belonging to Japan". Therefore, the claim for the "dominium over Tok Islets" has been openly included in the guidelines on teaching for senior middle schools in the wake of the similar step for the junior middle schools last year.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary says this shows the sinister intention of the Japanese reactionaries to justify their seizure of Tok Islets by instilling the idea that those islets are "Japan's territory" into the Japanese nationals and the international community by whatever means and methods.
					
					 The aim is to imbue the rising generation with the "pride" about Japan's history of aggression along with the ambition for seizure of other's territory and thus use them as a shock brigade in realizing the ambition for aggression of the continent, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It will ruin the future of Japan for the Japanese reactionaries to instill the distorted view on history into the new generation, being mad about realizing the ambition for continental aggression.
					
					 In the last century the Japanese militarists instilled the aggression idea of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" into many young and middle-aged men and hurled them as a shock brigade for executing their design for continental aggression, but in the end Japan sustained disgrace as a defeated nation.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries will only face a bitter end if they try to make the inglorious history repeat itself, being oblivious of the lesson of history.
					
					 They should behave themselves, mindful that their anachronistic act of tampering with history is as foolish an act as leading the country to the final destruction.

articles.title: Dok Islets Are Part of Korean Nation's Inviolable Territory: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Dok Islets Are Part of Korean Nation's Inviolable Territory: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government finally confirmed the teaching manuals stipulating that senior high schools are duty-bound to educate their students in the idea of Japan's "dominium over Tok islets."
					 Teaching manuals of similar contents for elementary and middle schools were made public just one year ago.
					
					 As a result, the students of elementary, middle and senior high schools in Japan are bound to be infused during their whole courses with the wrong claim that Tok islets are a part of "Japan's inviolable territory" and south Korea has "illegally occupied" them for decades, and with the twisted idea beautifying the past Japanese imperialists' wars of aggression and colonial rule over other countries.
					
					 The Abe cult persists in history distortion and education of rising generations in the idea of seizing other's territory. This is just a wanton provocation to the sovereignty of the Korean nation. It is also a product of its criminal design to instill the wild ambition for reinvasion into their minds and thus use them as a shock brigade for invading Korea.
					
					 Such history distortion rampant in education is attributable to the Japanese reactionaries' wild ambition for turning Japan into a military giant and launching reinvasion.
					
					 Abe is just a "pure-blooded militarist" who inherited the idea of the war criminals who masterminded the invasion of the continent in the past. His highest political goal is to make Japan shake off the disgrace and yoke as a defeated nation and take the path of overseas expansion.
					
					 Retrogressive revision of the Pacifist Constitution and distorted history education serve as twin pillars for propping up his scenario.
					
					 The Abe cult has pushed ahead with the revision of constitution and twisted history education for training the rising generations to be main players of reinvasion in a bid to make Japan a "country eligible to ignite a war," asserting "to change the constitution and educational system with their own hands is just little short of breaking with the post-war system."
					
					 The constitutional revision is imminent and twisted education on territorial claim has gone beyond the red line.
					
					 "'Abe's economics' is on the verge of bankruptcy and 'Abe's politics' is suspected of violating constitution, and 'Abe's military science' is rushing headlong into arms buildup. But all these will not be more serious than the harm which 'Abe's pedagogy' will do to the future of Japan and the Asia-Pacific region." This is a paragraph from foreign media.
					
					 Now organizations of political, social and civic circles in south Korea are raising their voice of protest. They are accusing the Japanese government of refusing to reflect on its past imperialistic aggression by instilling the wrong viewpoint on history into the rising generations, saying its rude language and acts wounding the public self-esteem will only precipitate its isolation.
					
					 As proven by history and as recognized by the world, Tok Islets are just a part of the inviolable territory of the Korean nation as were in the past.
					
					 "Dominium over the Tok Islets" touted by Japan is just nonsense.
					
					 Japan should no longer claim other's territory.
					
					 The more it claims other's territory, the stronger reaction from the international community it will face. And its poor image as a defeated nation and an aggressor nation will more boldly project.
					
					 The south Koreans should respond to the moves of Japan to grab Tok Islets with a stronger campaign for defending them.

articles.title: International Kim Il Sung Prize Awarded to IIJI Director-General
articles.content:
International Kim Il Sung Prize Awarded to IIJI Director-General
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- An event was held in Ulan Bator of Mongolia on April 7 to award the International Kim Il Sung Prize to Ramon Jimenez Lopez, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI).
					 Attending it were the secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, the director-general, the secretary general and directors of the IIJI, members of the Juche idea study organizations in Asia, Africa, Europe and Latin America, social personages of Mongolia and Japan, the DPRK ambassador to Mongolia and staff members of his embassy and a delegation of the Korean Association of Social Scientists.
					
					 At the event a decision of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council was read out and a diploma, medal and souvenir were awarded to Ramon Jimenez Lopez.
					
					 He said that the awarding of the prize is his greatest honor, expressing his resolve to conduct more vigorously the study and dissemination of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism brightly illuminating the road ahead of mankind.
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made by Mukesh Sharma, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, and Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Printed in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Printed in Italy
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Italy brought out in booklet the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" at the Roma Carlo Kelini Printing House on Mar. 28 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by the President and leader Kim Jong Il throughout their lives.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly preserving and glorifying the idea and exploits of the President and the leader.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Visit to China Hailed Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Visit to China Hailed Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Personages of Guinea and Ethiopia issued statements on April 1 and 4 in congratulation of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's successful visit to China.
					 Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea, said that Kim Jong Un's unofficial visit to China was an epochal occasion of weighty significance in opening a fresh page of the traditional DPRK-China friendship provided by the leaders of elder generations of the two countries.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The Chinese party and state leaders accorded full state honors to HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Through his China visit he demonstrated that the DPRK-China friendship is eternal.
					
					 We are sure that the DPRK-China friendship will develop in the interests of the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said:
					
					 The news of respected HE Kim Jong Un's visit to China is jolting the whole planet.
					
					 The DPRK-China friendship has very deep historic roots.
					
					 His visit helped this friendship develop freshly along its orbit.
					
					 The visit serves as a great contribution to peace in the Korean peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 We admire his wise guidance, bravery and indomitable will to carry forward the intention of the preceding leaders without an inch of deflection.
					
					 We warmly congratulate his successful China visit.

articles.title: Events Held Abroad to Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Events Held Abroad to Mark Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to celebrate the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 There were celebration meetings, book and photo exhibitions and lectures in Mexico, Serbia, Benin, Angola and Uganda between March 22 and April 2.
					
					 On display at their venues were photos showing the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There were also works of the peerlessly great men and books and photos introducing the proud achievements registered by the Korean people.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico praised the undying feats of Kim Il Sung who founded the immortal Juche idea to show the road ahead of the progressive mankind and turned the DPRK into a socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 The chairman of the Serbian national preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun stressed that Kim Il Sung, a great thinker-theoretician, is the outstanding statesman of the 20th century.
					
					 The chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea who is chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" said that the energetic ideo-theoretical activities of Kim Il Sung opened the era of independence, a new era of history in which the popular masses carve out their destiny independently and creatively.
					
					 Speakers at a lecture meeting in Angola said that Kim Il Sung is the tender-hearted father of the people who devoted all his life to them, adding his virtue and exploits would be eternally cherished in the minds of mankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Swiss, British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Swiss, British Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Swiss and British organizations issued statements on April 1 and 4 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the 106th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said in a joint statement that the Day of the Sun of this year marking the 70th founding anniversary of the DPRK is of special significance, praising Kim Il Sung's nation-building exploits.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung is the father of socialist Korea.
					
					 All the policies for the people originate from his life-long motto of believing in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 Under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the outstanding strategist, the army and people of the DPRK repelled the U.S. imperialists' invasion and won the brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 In his lifetime the President had worked hard for the people's happiness, national reunification and peace of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 The Day of the Sun has now become the biggest holiday of the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 The British preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun said that Kim Il Sung is the eternal President of the DPRK and a prominent teacher of the world revolution.
					
					 It noted that he is the iron-willed brilliant commander who liberated Korea from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and defeated the U.S. imperialists and the tender-hearted father of the people, who built the socialist system centered on the popular masses in the land of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed by the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on April 6.
					 Dolgachev, first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and chairman of the Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the Far East Region, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events such as seminar and film show in praise of the exploits of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Conversan los cancilleres de la RPDC y la FR
articles.content:
Conversan los cancilleres de la RPDC y la FR
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 10 las conversaciones entre Ri Yong Ho, ministro de Relaciones Exteriores y jefe de la delegacion gubernamental de la RPDC de visita oficial en la Federacion Rusa, y su homologo ruso, Serguei Lavrov.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion gubernamental y el embajador y otros miembros de la embajada coreana en Rusia y por la rusa, los funcionarios relacionados del MINREX.
					
					Ambas partes llegaron al consenso de que desarrollar aun mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Rusia con larga historia y tradicion conviene a la aspiracion y deseo de los pueblos de ambos paises.
					
					Acordaron ampliar mas las relaciones de buena vecindad y cooperacion de beneficio mutuo en varios dominios como la politica y la economia en este ano significativo del aniversario 70 del establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas entre ambos paises e intercambiaron las opiniones sobre los problemas regionales e internacionales de interes mutuo.
					
					La parte rusa expreso el total apoyo al hecho de que se ha creado recientemente en la Peninsula Coreana el clima de distension y paz gracias a la posicion pacifista y la decision resuelta del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Ri Yong Ho se reunio el dia 9 con el secretario general del Consejo de Seguridad de la Federacion Rusa, Nikolai Patrushev.

articles.title: Grupo artistico chino participara en Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera
articles.content:
Grupo artistico chino participara en Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- El grupo artistico chino presidido por Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del Partido Comunista de China, visitara a la RPDC para tomar parte en el XXXI Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera.
					El prestigioso grupo artistico chino de gran dimension, que visitara a nuestro pais por primera vez despues de que los maximos lideres de los dos partidos y paises acordaran intensificar el intercambio cultural durante la primera visita historica de Kim Jong Un a China, contribuira a consolidar la piedra angular del intercambio cultural Corea-China y desarrollar en la nueva etapa las tradicionales relaciones de amistad Corea-China.
					
					El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea da la calurosa bienvenida a los enviados artisticos del amistoso pais vecino y les acogera con preferencia y maxima sinceridad.

articles.title: Inaugurado XXXI Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera
articles.content:
Inaugurado XXXI Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado en esta capital el XXXI Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera.
					 En el presente festival participaran los artistas prestigiosos y habiles de varios paises y tambien los vocalistas sobresalientes en el Primer Concurso Internacional de Musica Vocal de Pyongyang.
					
					La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar hoy en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este.
					
					Cuando los artistas extranjeros y otros compatriotas llegaron a la avenida frente a la sede del festival, los trabajadores capitalinos les dieron una calurosa bienvenida agitando los ramos de flores. 
					
					La interpretacion ritmica de la banda femenina de instrumentos de viento, el baile, varias piezas acrobaticas y los movimientos graciosos de los ninos aportaron la peculiaridad al ambiente del acto. 
					
					Tomaron parte en la ceremonia el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Pak Kwang Ho, el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho y otros funcionarios interesados, trabajadores capitalinos, artistas extranjeros y coreanos residentes en otras naciones, las delegaciones provenientes de varios paises, los representantes diplomaticos y de las organizaciones internacionales, los agregados militares y los miembros de las embajadas, acreditados en Corea, y los compatriotas ultramarinos que permanecen ahora en la patria socialista. 
					
					El discurso inaugural estuvo a cargo del ministro de Cultura, Pak Chun Nam quien es presidente del comite organizador del festival.
					
					El dio calurosa bienvenida a los participantes del XXXI Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera que se realiza con motivo del 106o aniversario del nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Y agradecio a los gobiernos y los circulos de arte y cultura de varios paises que brindaron una colaboracion activa para la exitosa apertura del festival bajo el ideal de independencia, paz y amistad.
					
					Expreso la esperanza de que en el presente festival se daran a conocer magnificamente la sobresaliente cultura y tradiciones de los paises y naciones correspondientes.
					
					La jefa del Coro Folclorico Academico Nacional M. E. Pyatnichki y el jefe del Conjunto Artistico del Ejercito de Mongolia pronunciaron los discursos de felicitacion.
					
					En la ceremonia inaugural, se ofrecio una funcion de artistas coreanos.

articles.title: ACNC exige en comentario intensificar la lucha por defender el islote Tok
articles.content:
ACNC exige en comentario intensificar la lucha por defender el islote Tok
Pyongyang, 11 de abril (ACNC) -- El gobierno japones confirmo finalmente la guia de estudio para las escuelas superiores que estipula obligatoria la educacion del "derecho a la posesion del islote Tok".
					Hace un ano exactamente, se dieron a luz las guias de estudio para las escuelas primarias y secundarias del mismo contenido.
					
					Como resultado, todos los alumnos japoneses seran educados con el criterio tergiversado de que el islote Tok es "territorio propio" de Japon y el Sur de Corea lo "ocupa ilegalmente" durante varios decenios.
					
					Ademas, tendran la inclinacion a justificar las guerras de agresion y el dominio colonial de los imperialistas japoneses en el pasado.
					
					Asi, la banda de Abe recurre continuamente a la distorsion de su historia y la educacion a favor de extorsion del territorio ajeno, lo que constituye una provocacion brutal sobre la soberania territorial de la nacion coreana y forma parte del intento criminal de insuflar en los miembros de la nueva generacion la ambicion de reagresion para utilizarlas como brigada de choque en la eventual agresion a Corea.
					
					Ademas, esa conducta de los reaccionarios japoneses esta relacionada con su ambicion de convertir el pais en una potencia militar.
					
					La maxima meta politica de Abe, militarista de "raza pura" descendido de los criminales que habian agredido al continente asiatico, es quitarse la deshonra de derrotado en la guerra, que sufrieron sus antecesores, y volver a emprender el camino de expansion a ultramar.
					
					Para alcanzarla, impulsa dos proyectos principales que son la enmienda de la Constitucion de Paz y la educacion de la historia tergiversada.
					
					Para hacer de Japon un "pais capaz de hacer la guerra", insisten en que "cambiar con mano propia la Constitucion y el sistema de educacion significa la salida del regimen posbelico".
					
					Hoy en dia, se hace una realidad a ojos vista la enmienda de la Constitucion de paz y llega a la etapa insoslayable la educacion del territorio basada en embustes.
					
					Un medio extranjero advirtio como sigue:
					
					La "economia de Abe" se da casi al colapso, la "politica de Abe" es sospechada de violacion de la Constitucion y la "doctrina militar de Abe" marcha por la senda de incremento de las fuerzas armadas. Pero, el conjunto de ellas sera menos pernicioso que los danos que causaria la "pedagogia de Abe" al futuro de Japon y la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Ahora, las entidades surcoreanas de circulos politico, social y civil elevan las voces de protesta a la tergiversacion de los hechos en torno al islote Tok en Japon advirtiendo que ella acelerara el aislamiento del pais isla.
					
					Como comprueba la historia y reconoce el mundo, el Tok es el inalienable territorio de la nacion coreana.
					
					Nunca hubo ni habra el "derecho a posesion del islote Tok" de que habla tanto Japon.
					
					Este pais isleno debe dejar su codicia sobre los territorios ajenos.
					
					Hay que recordar que en el caso contrario, sera repudiado mas fuertemente por la sociedad internacional y se pondra de relieve su bochornosa imagen de pais agresor y derrotado en la guerra, lejos de regresar al "Estado normal".
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos deben responder con la lucha mas intensa por defender la integridad territorial, en particular, el islote Tok, a las tentativas de Japon de usurparlo.
